articles.description: All the latest reaction as Bournemouth beat Fulham in the Premier League to boost their hopes of qualifying for Europe

articles.description: Great Britain's Daniel Dubois could have the chance of revenge against Oleksandr Usyk this summer in a contest to unify all four world heavyweight titles.
articles.title: Usyk vs Dubois: Daniel Dubois in talks to fight Oleksandr Usyk at Wembley in July

articles.description: Rory McIlroy's sports psychologist Bob Rotella says it was "part of the game plan" to not engage with Masters playing partner Bryson DeChambeau.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy not speaking to Bryson DeChambeau at Masters was 'part of his game plan'

articles.description: Wayne Rooney, Andrew Cole, Tyrese Campbell and more discuss the life and tragic death of former Arsenal and Everton striker Kevin Campbell.
articles.title: Kevin Campbell: Wayne Rooney, Andy Cole and more discuss ex-Arsenal and Everton striker's life and death

articles.description: PSG teenager Desire Doue has gone from a false start to the talk of European football, says BBC Sport's chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: PSG's Desire Doue - the brilliant teen who is the talk of Europe

articles.description: A selection of some of the most striking sports photographs taken around the world over the past seven days.
articles.title: In Pictures: Sporting photos of the week

articles.description: BBC Sport F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions following the Bahrain Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Piastri, Norris, Hamilton, McLaren, Ferrari, race penalties and the engine debate

articles.description: Bob Arum - who promoted Tyson Fury for years - does not think fans should expect a comeback from the retired heavyweight.
articles.title: Tyson Fury: Promoter Bob Arum believes Fury "will never fight again"

articles.description: Rory McIlroy's Masters win puts him in the pantheon of golfing greats and as the first European to complete the feat, in the conversation to be considered the continent's greatest ever, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy wins Masters and is up there with Europe's greatest golfers

articles.description: Concacaf president Victor Montagliani criticises a proposal to expand the 2030 men's World Cup to 64 teams.
articles.title: 2030 World Cup: Concacaf says 64-team tournament should not be considered
